turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'm applying for a software engineer position at Google. I'm a bit overwhelmed by the application process, can you help me optimize my resume and cover letter?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! I can assist you with that. To best help you, please provide me with your current resume and the job description. I can then analyze them and offer suggestions for improvement, including keywords to incorporate, formatting tips, and general advice on how to tailor your application to Google's requirements.  I'll also need to know the type of software engineering role (e.g., backend, frontend, mobile) you are targeting.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Great, thanks! Here's my resume. But, honestly, I'm not sure what type of software engineer role to apply for. Is there a way you can help me figure out which one is the best fit for my experience? I've done a bit of everything...

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can help. Based on the information provided in your resume, I can analyze your skills and experience and give suggestions on the best-fit roles. This isn't a perfect system, and I cannot give a comprehensive career consultation, but I can provide a list of potential roles at Google that align with your skillset, along with the skills they each emphasize. I can also suggest key skills based on the Google's job descriptions and suggest how to emphasize them on your resume. Please provide the job description of the position to which you are applying.
